summary: A 58 year old woman tries to make a plan to solve her financial problems after several robberies at her store. She contemplates her life.
cast: Carmina Barrios|María León|Paco Casaus|Ana María García|Raimundo Carrasco|Fran Torres|Miguel Alcíbar|José Mari Bizcocho|Mari Paz Sayago|Guillermo Weickert|Paqui Montoya|Antonio León|Antonio Estrada|Rafael Martín Ortiz|Antonio Adarve|José Manuel Postigo|Luis Fernández de Eribe|Eloi Costa|Mayra Gómez Kemp
title: Carmina o revienta.
